actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to amend the Administrative Procedures Act and for other purposes.
short_title: Amendments to the Administrative Procedures Act

summary.text: Amendments to the Administrative Procedures Act - Establishes notice requirements for proposed rulemaking by agencies of the Federal Government. Sets forth specified requirements to be met in order for a rule to take effect. Provides that such rules shall not be effective if either House of Congress passes a resolution of disapproval. Establishes guidelines for the consideration of such resolutions.

titles.title: Amendments to the Administrative Procedures Act
A bill to amend the Administrative Procedures Act and for other purposes.
